author: Emma Roth
title: Apple says iPhones will support RCS in 2024
description: Apple says the iPhone will get support for RCS messaging, the messaging standard used by most Android phones. Companies like Google and Samsung have pushed for Apple to add RCS support.

author: Jacob Kastrenakes
title: IBM pulls X ads as Elon Musk endorses white pride
description: An investigation indicated ads from IBM and others appeared alongside pro-Nazi X content as owner Elon Musk agreed with an antisemitic post.

author: Victoria Song
title: Fitbit Charge 6 review: practically a Pixel band
description: The $159.95 Fitbit Charge 6 is a capable fitness tracker for casual users — one in which Google’s presence is more and more obvious.

author: Andrew J. Hawkins
title: Lucid swerves into the electric SUV market with the three-row Gravity
description: Lucid Motors announced the Gravity SUV, a three-row EV with 440 miles of range and a starting price of $80,000. The new EV is expected to start production in late 2024.

author: Abigail Bassett
title: The house that climate change built
description: Housing is in crisis, thanks to short supply, high demand, and the encroaching threat of climate change. How do you build a home for the future?

author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
title: The Verge’s 2023 gaming and entertainment holiday gift guide: TVs, controllers, and more
description: Gamers may have fickle tastes, but there are still ways to wow them. Here, we’ve compiled a helpful collection of gaming and entertainment gifts for your beloved geek.

title: The Verge
description: The Verge is about technology and how it makes us feel. Founded in 2011, we offer our audience everything from breaking news to reviews to award-winning features and investigations, on our site, in video, and in podcasts.

author: Emme Hall
title: How an off-road rally for women keeps EVs rolling using clean energy
description: The Rebelle Rally is an off-road motorsports event for women that uses green hydrogen and other clean energy sources to keep the EVs fully charged.

author: Kara Verlaney
title: The present — and future — of sustainability
description: Sustainability often gets glossed over in the tech world. But true environmental stewardship demands we think deeper about the lifecycle of our devices — and the energy that powers them.

author: Jess Weatherbed
title: SpaceX’s second Starship and Super Heavy flight test cleared for launch
description: The second test flight for SpaceX’s giant Starship rocket is scheduled to take place as soon as November 18th after being given the go-ahead by the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA).
